```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
rule_descriptions <- read.csv("Rule_descriptions_Hangul.csv")
hangul_letters <- read.csv("Letters_Hangul.csv")
all_rules <- read.csv("all-rule-data.csv")
```

```{r}
# pulling rule numbers as numeric values to match "all_rules" values
rule_binary <- as.numeric(substring(colnames(hangul_letters)[-c(1, 2)], 2))

# filtering for Hangul's best set of rules and their descriptions
best_set_descriptions <- all_rules |>
  filter(Rule.Binary %in% rule_binary)
```
